idea-plugin.description:
This plugin enhances IntelliJ's support for Google Closure. It can determine missing/obsolete/duplicate 'goog.require' statements and offers corresponding quick-fixes. In addition, there is an inspection and quick-fix for usages of bracket notation (instead of dot notation) for accessing properties.
More info & source code: https://github.com/Dan1ve/ClosureInspectionsPlugin
idea-plugin.change-notes: - New inspection to avoid bracket notation (e.g. myVar['myField']), which cannot be type-checked by the Closure compiler. - Duplicate goog.require/goog.provide statements are now reported, too.
